boardgame.name: Prêt-à-Porter
boardgame.description: Pr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ecirc;t-_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;agrave;-Porter is an economic strategy game set in a world of fashion. Players run clothes companies and fight for dominance during fashion shows. It is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; perhaps _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; one of the most cruel and ruthless of all our games. Money can be a dangerous weapon._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During the game players open new branches and outlets, hire new workers and try to gain new capabilities. New Design Agencies, Brand stores or Preparation rooms are opened, Accountants, Models and Designers are hired, lucrative contracts are signed to allow for short-term profits and expand company_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s competencies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Every single month player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s company gains new capabilities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each quarter held fashion shows _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; each player has to prepare a collection of clothing and has to show it on the show. The public, media, experts estimate collections in four categories and award prizes and diplomas. The more awards (represented by _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;lsquo;stars_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; in the game) will be collected at the show, the more money the players earn for selling their collection!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Will you get award for best Trends? Will you manage to be best in Public Relations and get the Media award? Will you earn more _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;lsquo;stars_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; than your opponent?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If you win _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;lsquo;stars_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;, your opponents don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If you win _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;lsquo;stars_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;, you earn more money. Your opponents don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If you win _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;lsquo;stars_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;, you earn money, you hire new stuff, you get better. Your opponents don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;That is why during show you will kill for every single _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;lsquo;star_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;. Welcome to the hell_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Pr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ecirc;t-_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;agrave;-Porter is a 2-4 player board game, unique mix of deep economy strategy and direct interaction. Low luck element, many important decisions to be made and many strategies that can be used to acclaim victory. With wide range of different employees, different buildings and contracts you can create your unique company every single time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Played only once, pristine condition. English edition. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Domestic US shipping is $11.35 for USPS Priority Mail with tracking (insurance is optional if you want to pay for it). International shipping will be actual price plus USD$5.00 (sorry, it is a much bigger hassle on my end, plus I need to provide the box). Contact me if you have any questions about shipping. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees). I have many other games up for sale and in most cases I can combine shipping for some significant savings, but please check with me and provide your zip code for details.

REBEL CENTRIUM GIER (RCG0011) Prêt-à-Porter is 2-4 players board game, unique mix of deep economy strategy and direct interaction. Low luck element, many important decisions to be made and many strategies that can be used to acclaim victory. With wide range of different employees, different buildings and contracts you can create your unique company every single time.

Thanks for looking, and thanks for supporting a small business!

1. Shipping is from 23113 (Midlothian, VA) and paid by the purchaser. 2. Please geekmail me for shipping quote. I am willing to ship through any major carrier (USPS, FedEx, or UPS). Most people prefer USPS as their shipping costs are much more competitive. That being said, please keep in mind the constrained box sizes of priority/regional-boxes (It may not be possible to package the game super well, which could lead to some box damage in transport). 3. Please allow a few days for the games to be shipped. 4. In general, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m careful about the condition of my games but I am not a collector... I often discard advertisements and inserts. Furthermore, most played games were sleeved during play... but any sleeves will be remove before shipping.
